!First Elder Lockirin: This association consists of representatives from the *six guilds* that are the most powerful among the hundreds of Dwarven guilds. Due to the lack of a king, all the important policies are determined by the Senior Association. Together they rule this the Kingdom of the Dwarves, until the king returns. [npc_%objectId%_Chat 3|Ask about top six guilds] [npc_%objectId%_Chat 0|Return]
